divs: Sighting DetailsSitting on my porch as it was very hot sipping tea. Couldn't help not to as the sky was very clear. I thought it was a plane. Very large oval with numerous windows. It was pulsating opaque lights in varying shade of blue, mauve, green and yellow. It remained quite still and quiet through the whole incident. I looked into my tea and thought I had put a shot of 100% Jaimacan rum into it, alas that was not the case. I shook my head for a few minutes and sat watching the show open mouthed. I have been waiting to see something like this for 60 of my 79 years. It hovered and hovered and hovered and then suddenly it disappeared straight up into the night sky as a incrediable speed
Summary: I was sitting on my porch and a large pulsating orb houvered just over my house I watch it for some time
trends: There have been no other sightings in New Liskeard
This sighting has never been favorited.
